LanguageData.Plant_AYWhiteWillow.label: White Willow
LanguageData.Plant_AYWhiteWillow.description: Salix alba, the white willow, is a species of willow. The name derives from the white tone to the undersides of the leaves. It is a medium-sized to large deciduous tree. The bark is grey-brown, and deeply fissured in older trees.
